name: Dead Island Retro Revenge
description: Time for some 16-bit retro revenge! When his beloved cat gets kidnapped, Max sets out across a zombie-infested California to get him back by force!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 32bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2,2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 6th Generation Intel HD graphics Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Very simple, but often ball-bustingly hard game. Fun to play in short bursts or while you're listening to something else like a podcast. I don't think it's worth the full $5 but since I got it in the definitive collection bundle I'm not too worried about it.
TechLand can't even make a decent 2D arcade fighting game.  The hits and movement are delayed. I'd much rather be playing TMNT on NES.    0/10
